question_stem:
Question 4
Suppose you wanted to evaluate the performance of your KNN model with a confusion table. What inputs are required?
A
Predictions on the training data & actual outcomes of the testing data
B
Predictions on the testing data & actual outcomes of the testing data
C
Predictions on the testing data & actual outcomes of the training data
D
None of the above
